edges.direction: Walk straight ahead from the main gate for about 1 minute. You will reach the fountain plaza.
Turn left from the main gate. The parking lot is about 1 minute walk on your left.
From the fountain plaza, turn right. Walk straight for about 1 minute. The library is the large building ahead.
From the fountain plaza, continue straight ahead. The admin office is in the main building on your left.
From the admin office, walk towards Block A on your right. The CS department is on the second floor.
From the admin office, turn right and walk towards the auditorium building.
The IT department is one floor above the CS department in Block A. Take the stairs up.
The computer lab is at the end of the corridor on the second floor of Block A.
From the auditorium, walk towards Block B. The ECE department is on the first floor.
From the auditorium, walk south. The cafeteria is the building with the green roof.
From Block B, walk east towards Block C. The mechanical department is on the ground floor.
The workshop is behind Block C, just a short walk from the mechanical department.
From Block C, continue south to Block D. The civil department is on the ground floor.
From the cafeteria, walk south past the garden. The sports ground is the open area ahead.
Exit the library from the main entrance. Turn left and walk for about 2 minutes. The cafeteria is ahead.
From the parking lot, walk south along the campus boundary. The sports ground is on your right.
